long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visualize and measure JIRA Kanban data.

Load your JIRA issue and board data for a project, then get graph visualizations and measurements for it!

Uses conventional methods for measuring Kanban data but is also useful for Scrum boards.
